title: Payal Vadhani Joins Aronson LLC to Grow Technology Risk Services Practice
text:
Aronson LLC grows their Technology Risk Services Practice with the addition of Payal Vadhani, assurance and advisory risk management expert.
Rockville, Maryland (PRWEB) October 19, 2015
Aronson LLC recently announced that Payal Vadhani has joined the firm as a partner to grow its Technology Risk Services practice. Aronson, a nationally ranked top 100 assurance, tax, and consulting firm, is now poised to offer a full complement of assurance and advisory technology risk services, including internal auditing, IT risk management, information and cyber security, third party reporting, compliance, and process improvement.
“I am very pleased to welcome Payal as she takes the lead to grow and mature this practice,” said Jeffery Capron , Managing Partner at Aronson. “Our clients face pervasive technology risks at every turn, and we are proud to evolve our service platform to help our clients manage these risks. Payal offers our clientele a wealth of expertise and real-world experience, and she has demonstrated her proven ability to drive strategic growth.”
Payal is a seasoned executive with over fifteen years of assurance and advisory risk management experience. Throughout her career, she has sought to align clients’ needs and strategic objectives with an approach that manages the risks of technology with the benefits. As a trusted advisor to her clients, Payal succeeds in breaking down complex technology concepts and developing pragmatic, cost-effective solutions that minimize risk and add value. She offers significant experience building technology risk management programs and managing large advisory engagements.
Payal Vadhani commented on her new role, “It is truly an exciting time to join Aronson. I’m honored to play a vital leadership role and grow this practice further. Our goal is to position our clients to effectively manage their technology risks underpinned by a strong focus on next generation thinking and superb risk management execution.”
About Aronson LLC
Aronson LLC has been thinking ahead for its clients for more than 50 years. Aronson’s government contracting, construction and real estate, nonprofit, and technology experts provide innovative assurance, tax, and consulting services that help its clients move to the next level. From start-up to exit strategy, Aronson works with companies throughout the entire business lifecycle by proactively identifying opportunities and addressing challenges so that clients are able to focus on their core business. For more information about Aronson LLC, visit http://www.aronsonllc.com and follow us at @AronsonLLC for news and updates.
